alert.note: Alert for Otero Mesa (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 27 at 2:40AM MST until January 28 at 7:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Hudspeth County, southern Otero County, and areas west and east of the El Paso County * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 7 AM MST Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will be along west slope areas, canyons, ridgelines of the Franklin, Hueco, Guadeloupe Mountains and the Otero Mesa. Winds will gradually subside by early Friday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
